actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to remove certain criminal penalties imposed as a result of the failure of an individual to answer questions submitted in connection with a census or survey conducted under title 13, U.S. Code.

summary.text: Removes certain criminal penalties imposed as a result of the failure of an individual to answer questions submitted in connection with a census or survey conducted under title 13, United States Code.

titles.title: A bill to remove certain criminal penalties imposed as a result of the failure of an individual to answer questions submitted in connection with a census or survey conducted under title 13, U.S. Code.
